name: Darn Tough Topless Sunbaked Socks - Women's
description: Shine some light on your ankles. These super-low-cut socks hide inside your shoes so when your shoes are on, these socks are gone.Lightweight merino blend with no cushioning to smoothly glide into close-fitting shoes without bunching.Merino is naturally antimicrobial and prevents your feet from getting funky.True Seamless™ construction fuses seams for chafe-free wear.Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep.
